data.text: @Henrythejannie 2/ so I phoned to doc who said’oh feck give her the Bluddy thing’

@Henrythejannie I once read a data sheet that included’feeling strange’ in the side effects. Similarly a doctor phoned me to ask if I could leave the leaflet out of a woman’s pills because she would go in complaining of every single side effect. She sent her husband in the next day to ask for 1/
@kwallis7 I believe in personal choice and meds shouldn't be forced on to you, there's many people that think it's only the Covid jab has side effects.

@Henrythejannie Aspirin has been around since 1897 so plenty of long term data. I have minor concerns with low percentage of short term side effects, my reticence from the start was lack of long term data, especially given many of these vaccines are new/non traditional.
